reporting-org.narrative: Makerere University School of Public Health

description.narrative: Financial report for expense related to the inception phase activities

participating-org.narrative: Makerere University School of Public Health

activity-date.narrative: The inception phase activities started on 1st November 2018. A resource mapping report was submitted to MSI on 31st January 2019

recipient-country.narrative: All spent funds were reimbursed by the programme lead and sent to Uganda

sector.narrative: 70.4% of budgeted funds were spent on family planning activities
